channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Hello Kitty Took Over the World
item.description: Investors in Sanrio have made 10 times their money as the iconic Japanese brand expands digitally.

item.title: Darden Restaurants earnings disappoint as Olive Garden, fine dining sales struggle
item.description: Olive Garden parent Darden Restaurants reported weaker-than-expected earnings and revenue for its fiscal first quarter.

item.title: The Two Big Insurers Still Betting on Fossil Fuels
item.description: Most companies have cut back on oil, gas and coal investments after big climate-related losses. But State Farm and Berkshire Hathawayâ€™s insurance comp...

item.title: We ranked the latest earnings reports from 30 portfolio stocks from great to ugly
item.description: Our companies' performances were reflective of the S&P 500 firms in aggregate.

item.title: The High-Stakes Spat Over How Much Oil the World Really Needs
item.description: OPEC is sticking with its estimate that the world will need an extra two million barrels a day this year, despite signs this is unrealistic.

item.title: Adobe stock slips on soft fourth-quarter revenue guidance
item.description: Adobe reported third-quarter results on Thursday that beat Wall Street expectations for sales and earnings.

item.title: How to Invest in Bonds in a World of Falling Rates
item.description: Buying bonds can confront investors with a bewildering array of options, including Treasurys, company bonds and municipal debt.

item.title: Oracle bumps up fiscal 2026 revenue forecast, lifting stock 6%
item.description: Oracle is projecting higher revenue and capital expenditures as its cloud-computing arm grows.

item.title: Star FTX Witness Caroline Ellison Sentenced to Two Years in Prison
item.description: Former crypto executive contributed to a multibillion-dollar fraud.

item.title: These 5 portfolio stocks crushed the volatile market since our August Monthly Meeting
item.description: Investor concerns around the AI boom, coupled with the market's sensitivity to the Fed's next policy move, have caused Wall Street to seesaw in recent...
